name: four stories: COVID
description:
four stories: COVID is a short interactive story designed to educate players about COVID-19 by illustrating the consequences of our daily choices. Playthroughs take approximately 10-15 minutes and can be played on mobile or desktop.

Safe actions will reflect positive changes in the story, while unsafe actions will reflect negative changes in the story. Feel free to experiment and try out the choices you think might be "wrong" so you can better understand the consequences!

This game was built using Twine and HTML/CSS/JS.

If you like this story check out more by the author here. 

You can also check out the project this story was built for here.
